archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.1.1e: e) specialist systems that are important to the organisation, such as industrial control systems (including SCADA systems, Distributed Control Systems (DCS) and Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
